org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase

type
class
subclasses
org.silex.runtime.mouse.as3.Mouse
This package is made to offer a simple API for mouse interactions. This class is the base class for mouse interaction. It listens to mouse events thanks to runtime specific implementations and calls the appropriate registered callbacks. It takes a target native reference objects onto which the mouse event will be listening. The mouse event callbacks are called with a struct containing the mouse current data

Constructor

new(nativeReference : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference)
class constructor. Set the native mouse listeners

Instance Variables

onMouseDoubleClick : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

The callback to call when the native reference is double-clicked

onMouseDown : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

The callback to call when the native reference is clicked

onMouseMove : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

The callback to call when the mouse move while over the native reference

onMouseOut : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

The callback to call when the native reference is moused out

onMouseOver : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

the callback to call when the native reference is hovered

onMouseUp : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

The callback to call when the native reference is released
